body.p: I now take the plesurepleasure of fulfilling my promacepromise of writing to yoyou hoping to find yo en Joying good hlth I am not very well i am worse now than wen i got out of bed i tore my wound acominga-coming home the hole is a bout half an inch square I hante ben noware sence iI have been home iI have had the docter and he ordered me to bathe in sider soaky iI will hefhave to have my furlowfurlough exstendedextended I would have written be fore but i was not able to do it yoyouth must exscuseexcuse me—

the crops look much better here than they do in washingtonWashington I find a grategreat many that donte know me when i arrived in yorkYork my cosincousin was tharethere and he brought me to my home it has benbeen rainy ever since I have been home—
give my love to the boys in ward B I will be back Just as soon as i am able to come
No more at present Good by answer by return mail from a friend and ever shall be
